all: Use Australian English (colour, favourite, arvo, brekkie, reckon)
CRITICAL: 'we' not 'I' — Suntimes is a team, not a person
Reference specific suburbs, beaches, landmarks by name
Show opinions: 'fight us on this', 'overrated honestly'
Show uncertainty: 'not sure about this one yet'
Never aggressive sales language or brochure talk
